content: cloud 9 baby washcloth skill level easy materials cotton yarn/4 desired colors i love this cotton yarn in the sample photos u s size g/4 0mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitches & abbreviations blo = back loop only chain = chain half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch = half_double_crochet slip_stitch single_crochet= single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st s = stitches *please remember you are free to use this pattern to make/sell item s giving credit back to the designer do not republish or distribute this pattern or use my photos in any way feel free to share my shop links thank you page 1 of 5 cloud 9 knots crochet pattern shop © 2024 pattern & photos by nicole mansfield cloud 9 baby washcloth pattern instructions half_double_crochet slip_stitch - yarn over and insert hook in st pull up a loop 3 loops on hook pull the first loop on the hook through the remaining 2 loops on the hook 1 loop remains you have completed a half_double_crochet slip_stitch for a video demonstration on how to make this pattern please click on the following image or visit this link https //www youtube com/watch v=opfk8lcrjoy page 2 of 5 cloud 9 knots crochet pattern shop © 2024 pattern & photos by nicole mansfield cloud 9 baby washcloth note 1 - i have provided a link below to the exact cotton yarn that i use to make this pattern please understand that i have no ability to know if/when a specific yarn may be discontinued or unavailable thank you note 2- this pattern can be easily adjusted by making the foundation chain row any number of chain stitches in the desired width and adding on as many row as needed to achieve the desired length simply make sure you end on an odd row before proceeding to the border instructions i love this cotton yarn dove parchment rosy warm blush khaki hobby lobby wash cloth using the g hook and desired color of yarn *the chain 1 at the end of the row to turn will not count in the st count chain 25 row 1 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and in each chain st to the end of the row chain 1 to turn 23 half_double_crochet made row 2 1 blo single_crochet in each st to the end of the row chain 1 to turn 23 blo single_crochet made row 3-19 repeat row 1 and 2 through row 19 even row will be a row of blo single_crochet sts and odd row will be a row of half_double_crochet sts you will end with a row of half_double_crochet sts row 19 after row 19 chain 1 and turn the dish cloth to begin working the border down the side and around the wash cloth border the chain 1 at the beginning of row 1 will not count in the st count round 1 1 single_crochet in each st around the wash cloth working 3 single_crochet into each corner st when you
